data.name: Tiny Echo Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
With its soothing tones, the Tiny Echo Soundtrack brings you back to the cracks and corners in the environment of Tiny Echo.
Composed by Mount West, these atmospheric tracks might spark your curiosity, or just relax you with memories of your spiritual postal round.

We hope you don't mind us taking this opportunity to tell you about our latest game, the Tiny Multiplayer Online RPG Book of Travels!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1152340/Book_of_Travels/
